 */import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoadingSpinner=()=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading-spinner","aria-label":"Loading...",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"spinner"})});export default LoadingSpinner;
